body:
Hi mostapha & Chris, Thank you very much for grate development team work of Ladybug, Honeybee and also Butterfly! I have a question about import IDF file with shading. How can I import IDF files with Blind geometry and blind control create from DesignBuilder (Energyplus 8.1) or create with honeybee? when I try import IDF file into honeybee I'm facing the following warning with **HB_Import_IdF** component **:** 1. Currently Honeybee doesn't support importing shading controls!
Sorry and it will be added soon! Does have another way for that? Thanks in advance. -M_j
topic: Import IDF into Honeybee with Blind & Shading devices

replies.body: Hi Mohammad, Have you seen [this example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=EnergyPlus_Window_Shade_Generator&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0) on Hydra.
